resources.string:
You must be related to Sherlock Holmes. We thank you for staying invested in our first app.

Do you like the dark mode and animations?
We hope you enjoy this app and share your feedback.

It's lscambo13. I Thank you for installing our first app.

The app features full dark mode and nice animations. You should also take a look at the source code and the latest changes in version 3.0 from the three-dot menu at top-right corner.

We hope you enjoy this app and share your feedback at our Telegram support group.

1. Better theme in three-dot menu on the top-right corner
2. Fixed crashes on certain in the About screen
3. All new welcome and changelog dialogs
4. Numerous under-the-hood improvements and the source code is now much easy to follow
5. An easter egg. Can you find it?-

Check GitHub for more comprehensive list

Version 3.0
Free software under GNU GPL v3.0

An app to let you chat with others on WhatsApp without ever needing to actually save their phone number in contacts.

Created by:
LSCAMBO13 and MSC24X
